timeline.bodyText: I don't think you need to specify version here since it's covered by <dependencyManagement>
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: anyway, If you are not going to mock Kubernetes API. You can remove this
replies.author: rohanKanojia

timeline.bodyText: I think you should be able to use mocked KubernetesClient here also.
timeline.author: rohanKanojia
